summary.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

span.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以包含在字串及其屬性或非固定格式內容項目，例如， ，和，請在其屬性。A can contain a string in its property or flow content elements, such as , , and , in its property. 設計成輕量級，以及特別是在整合到非固定格式內容的小部份專為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is designed to be lightweight, and is geared specifically at integrating small portions of flow content into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 適用於單一線條顯示，並提供良好的效能，最多幾行內容的顯示。 is optimized for single-line display, and provides good performance for displaying up to a few lines of content. 不適合需要顯示多個幾行內容的案例對於這類情況中，加上適當的檢視控制項是較好的選擇，比，效能方面。 is not optimized for scenarios that need to display more than a few lines of content; for such scenarios, a coupled with an appropriate viewing control is a better choice than , in terms of performance. 在後，是下一步 的最小的-權數控制項，顯示非固定格式內容，而只提供少量的捲動內容區域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。After , is the next lightest-weight control for displaying flow content, and simply provides a scrolling content area with minimal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 被最佳化的非固定格式內容的 「 頁面-一次 」 檢視模式。 is optimized around "page-at-a-time" viewing mode for flow content. 最後，支援最豐富的設定功能，來檢視非固定格式內容，但對應的吃重。Finally, supports the richest set functionality for viewing flow content, but is correspondingly heavier-weight. 水平對齊文字內是使用屬性。Horizontally aligning text within a is done with the property. 對齊內頁面的配置利用和屬性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 元素。The following example shows how to use the element. summary.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: A物件，指定慣用的字型家族，或使用其中一個主要慣用的字型家族或多個後援字型家族。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子項目上的設定覆寫這個最上層的設定。Any settings on child elements override this top-level setting. 如果未指定多個系列的第二個和後續的字型系列會作為後援，可在其中主要字型系列是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果無法使用，指定的字型家族以無訊息模式切換回所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用量`<`*物件* `="`*值*`".../>`，其中*物件*為物件項目（通常非固定格式項目） 內所含，並*值*是其中一個字串格式的值，如下所述的 XAML 值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* `="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在程式碼，附加的屬性使用方式受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . 附加的屬性使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，在類似非附加`FontFamily`屬性，其中使用進行轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the uses for rendering. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是您可以新增至文字的視覺裝飾。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). 根據預設，這個屬性設定為`null`且沒有與其相關聯。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 然後再加入任何文字效果，建立新並將它指派給這個屬性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_TextBlock_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblock_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何， ，和分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically.
